content.rendered:
Esthetician | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time, Monday-Friday
  • Assist with skin therapies and massage
  • Will train on how to operate a laser for cosmetic procedures
  • One year experience a plus but will train the right candidate
  • Must have recently graduated from a reputable school of cosmetology
  • Compensation will depend on experience
